analyzed: dgag dbye byas nas lo brgyar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: And then for a hundred years he performs the poṣadha.

original: de yang de tshe rab tu byung ba'i tshe //
analyzed: de yang de tshe rab tu byung ba'i tshe //
translated: And when he has gone forth at that time,

original: tshangs par spyod pa dam pa spyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa dam pa spyod par 'gyur //
translated: He will practice pure, supreme celibacy.

original: dga' ba dang ni gus pa de yis su //
analyzed: dga' ba dang ni gus pa de yis su //
translated: With that joy and devotion

original: der min rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed //
analyzed: der min rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed //
translated: He will make offerings to the Jinas, not to others.🔽In due course, practicing bodhisattva conduct,

original: mthar gyis byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na; ;dus bzang ba yi rgyal ba thams cad mthong //
analyzed: mthar gyis byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na; ;dus bzang ba yi rgyal ba thams cad mthong //
translated: He will see all the Jinas, the Sugatas.🔽He will see more buddhas

original: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed //🔽de bas lhag pa'i sangs rgyas de yis mthong //
analyzed: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed // de bas lhag pa'i sangs rgyas de yis mthong //
translated: Than there are sands in the Ganges River.

original: sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas dad pa byed //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de dag mthong nas dad pa byed //
translated: Having seen those buddhas, he will have faith in them,

original: 'phag pa'i ye shes de ni su mi 'dod //
analyzed: 'phag pa'i ye shes de ni su mi 'dod //
translated: And will not give up the wisdom of the āryas.

original: sems de'i dad pa de ni de 'dra ba //
analyzed: sems de'i dad pa de ni de 'dra ba //
translated: The faith of that mind is like that.

original: phyogs tsam nga yis da lta bstan pa yin //
analyzed: phyogs tsam nga yis da lta bstan pa yin //
translated: I have now taught just a fraction.

original: de tshe de yi yon tan ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: de tshe de yi yon tan ci 'dra ba //
translated: What kind of qualities will he have at that time?

original: nga yis dpe bstan par ni nus ma yin //
analyzed: nga yis dpe bstan par ni nus ma yin //
translated: I am not able to teach an example of that.

original: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed //🔽bskal pa mang por de tshe 'khor nas su //
analyzed: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed // bskal pa mang por de tshe 'khor nas su //
translated: For as many eons as there are sands in the Ganges River,🔽he will then turn the wheel

original: phyin chad de yis theg pa mchog reg cing //
analyzed: phyin chad de yis theg pa mchog reg cing //
translated: and in the future he will reach the supreme vehicle

original: snying po'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: snying po'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur //
translated: and become the Victorious One called Heap of Essence.

original: de tshe tshe ni bskal pa stong thub 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe tshe ni bskal pa stong thub 'gyur //
translated: At that time his lifespan will be a thousand eons.

original: de tshe de yi zhing gi bkod 'byung ba //
analyzed: de tshe de yi zhing gi bkod 'byung ba //
translated: The array of his realm will appear

original: dper na lha gnas ri rab rtse mo bzhin //
analyzed: dper na lha gnas ri rab rtse mo bzhin //
translated: like the peak of Mount Meru, the abode of the gods.

original: dzambu'i gling de yang ni de 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: dzambu'i gling de yang ni de 'drar 'gyur //
translated: That Jambudvīpa will also be like that.

original: rgyal ba'i snying po'i tshogs ni de snyed kyi //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i snying po'i tshogs ni de snyed kyi //
translated: The assembly of the essence of the Victorious Ones will be that many.

original: nyan thos de tshe 'dus pa gang yin pa //🔽ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed //
analyzed: nyan thos de tshe 'dus pa gang yin pa // ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed //
translated: The assembly of hearers at that time🔽will be as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River,

original: bye ba khrag khrig phrag ni mang po 'byung //
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig phrag ni mang po 'byung //
translated: many quintillions.

original: de bzhin de tshe 'dus pa 'byung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: de bzhin de tshe 'dus pa 'byung 'gyur ba //
translated: And at that time, an assembly will arise.

original: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma @270a *//
analyzed: ji ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma @270a *//
translated: Like the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: snyed; ;dgra bcom zag pa zad cing nyon mongs med //
analyzed: snyed; ;dgra bcom zag pa zad cing nyon mongs med //
translated: Arhats who have exhausted defilements and are free from afflictions,

original: de tshe dbang gyur rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin //
analyzed: de tshe dbang gyur rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin //
translated: Who have attained mastery and perfected miraculous powers,

original: shes rab 'byung gnas sh'a ri'i bu ji bzhin //
analyzed: shes rab 'byung gnas sh'a ri'i bu ji bzhin //
translated: Like Shariputra, the source of wisdom,

original: dri ba gtan la 'bebs par ye shes 'phags //
analyzed: dri ba gtan la 'bebs par ye shes 'phags //
translated: Who is exalted in his knowledge of answering questions,

original: chos mngon mdo sde 'dul ba rnams la mkhas //
analyzed: chos mngon mdo sde 'dul ba rnams la mkhas //
translated: Skilled in the Abhidharma, sutras, and Vinaya,

original: nga yis nyan thos mchog ni lung bstan bzhin //
analyzed: nga yis nyan thos mchog ni lung bstan bzhin //
translated: I prophesy him as the supreme shravaka.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i tshogs nyid kyi; ;'dus pa de tshe nyis 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa snying po'i tshogs nyid kyi; ;'dus pa de tshe nyis 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: The assembly of the Tathagata's essence will double at that time,

original: de dag byang chub dam pa mchog la zhugs //
analyzed: de dag byang chub dam pa mchog la zhugs //
translated: Engaged in the supreme, excellent enlightenment,

original: ma pham zhes bya'i byams pa ji bzhin no //
analyzed: ma pham zhes bya'i byams pa ji bzhin no //
translated: Like Maitreya, known as Ajita.

original: de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'ang yin //
analyzed: de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'ang yin //
translated: They will be obstructed by only one birth,

original: bla med byang chub tu ni de tshe 'gyur //
analyzed: bla med byang chub tu ni de tshe 'gyur //
translated: And at that time, they will attain unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: de nas shi 'phos shi ba'i dus byas nas //
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos shi ba'i dus byas nas //
translated: Then, having died and passed away,

original: zhing gzhan gzhan du de dag byang chub rtogs //
analyzed: zhing gzhan gzhan du de dag byang chub rtogs //
translated: And in other realms they will realize enlightenment.🔽The assemblies of the steadfast, the heroes, the wise,

original: dpa' ba dpa' bo blo gros brtan rnams kyi; ;'dus pa de bas kyang ni lhag par 'gyur //
analyzed: dpa' ba dpa' bo blo gros brtan rnams kyi; ;'dus pa de bas kyang ni lhag par 'gyur //
translated: Will be even greater than that.

original: de tshe theg mchog bla na med par ni //
analyzed: de tshe theg mchog bla na med par ni //
translated: At that time, in the unsurpassed supreme vehicle,

original: snying po'i tshogs kyi sangs rgyas lung ston 'gyur //
analyzed: snying po'i tshogs kyi sangs rgyas lung ston 'gyur //
translated: The Buddha will prophesy the assembly of the essence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: Even after the Tathāgata’s nirvāṇa,

original: de tshe chos tshul bskal par gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe chos tshul bskal par gnas par 'gyur //
translated: The Dharma will remain for an eon.
